info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-global-oper
info.description:
This module contains client operational data aggregated across wireless processes.
     Copyright (c) 2022-2023, 2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 39

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-global-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-global-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-global-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-client-global-oper.html)

get.description: Root container for client operational data aggregated across wireless processes
Snapshot of statistics of current state of wireless clients
Types of devices and their statistics
List of AP in sorted order (collection)
List of AP in sorted order
List of WLAN in sorted order (collection)
List of WLAN in sorted order
List of AP in sorted order (collection)
List of AP in sorted order
List of WLAN in sorted order (collection)
List of WLAN in sorted order

vap-ssid.description: SSID of the Wireless LAN to which the client is connected.

ms-assoc-time.description: Absolute time at which the client associated

current-channel.description: Channel number on which the client associated

width.description: Channel width on which the client associated

model-number.description: Model number of the client device

bytes-tx.description: The number of bytes of wireless data traffic transmitted to the Mobile station on a particular Wireless LAN.

bytes-rx.description: The number of bytes of wireless data traffic received from the Mobile station on a particular Wireless LAN.

auth-state-clients.description: Number of clients in authenticating state

mobility-state-clients.description: Number of clients in mobility state

iplearn-state-clients.description: Number of clients in IP learn state

webauth-state-clients.description: Number of clients in web authenticating state

run-state-clients.description: Number of clients in run state

delete-state-clients.description: Number of clients in deletion state

random-mac-clients.description: Number of clients using random MAC address

assoc-requests-received.description: Total client association request received statistics

ft-localauth-attempts.description: Total client fault tolerance local auth attempt state statistics

client-l2auth-success.description: Total client l2 auth success state statistics

client-l2auth-failures.description: Total client l2 auth failure state statistics

client-l3auth-attempts.description: Total client l3 auth attempt state statistics

client-l3auth-failures.description: Total client l3 auth failed state statistics

client-mab-attempts.description: Total client mab attempts state statistics

client-mab-failures.description: Total client mab failed state statistics

ms-radio-type.description: Radio type used by client to join AP

slot-id.description: The radio slot on the access point to which the client is connected in the wireless network, slot 255 represents invalid slot ID.

co-state.description: The state of the client indicates the last phase of the association the client has been able to complete successfully.

ap-mac-addr.description: MAC Address of the Access Point to which the client has joined.

ms-bssid.description: Basic Service Set Identifier to which the Mobile station is connected.

cur-chan.description: Current Channel on which the wireless client is communicating with Access Point in the wireless LAN.

policy-profile.description: Policy profile applied on the Wireless LAN to which the wireless client is connected

wlan-profile.description: Profile applied on the Wireless/Remote/Guest LAN to which the client is connected

speed.description: Latest speed of the connected client.

pkts-tx.description: The number of packets of wireless data traffic transmitted to the Mobile station on a particular Wireless LAN.

snr.description: Last updated Signal To Noise Ratio is recorded.

rssi.description: RSSI is the relative received signal strength in a wireless environment, Last updated Radio Signal Strength indicator is recorded.

data-retries.description: The number of retries a wireless mobile station has executed for the wireless data traffic on a particular Wireless LAN.

mm-client-role.description: Mobility role of wireless mobile stations on Wireless LAN Controller

action-frame-req.description: Total DMS requests received in action frame

action-frame-resp.description: Total DMS responses sent in action frame

reassoc-req.description: Total DMS requests received in Re-assoc Request

ap-auth-roams.description: Total Flexconnect AP authentication roaming attempts

ap-auth-dot11i-fast-roam.description: Total number of 802.11i fast roam attempts at AP authentication

ap-auth-dot11i-slow-roam.description: Total number of 802.11i slow roam attempts at AP authentication

pmkr0-name-mismatch.description: Total 802.11r pairwise master key R0 name mismatch

pmkr1-name-mismatch.description: Total 802.11r pairwise master key R1 name mismatch

total-ex-max-denial.description: Load balancing exceeded denial maximum limit counts

cand-5g.description: APs that are not 5GHz candidates for service set transition

cand-24g.description: APs that are not 2.4GHz candidates for service set transition
